title.zh: 漢興以來將相名臣年表
title.en: Chronicle of Generals, Chancellors, and Worthy Ministers since Han Founding

translations.idiomatic: The following dates are Before the Common Era.
This is the Record of Major Events.

cells.idiomatic: This is the first year of Emperor Gao's reign.

cells.content: 春，沛公為漢王，之南鄭。秋，還定雍。
cells.literal: Spring, Pei Gong became Han King, went to Nanzheng. Autumn, returned pacified Yong.
cells.idiomatic: In spring, Lord Pei became the King of Han and went to Nanzheng. In autumn, he returned and pacified Yong.

cells.literal: One. Chancellor Xiao He defended Hanzhong.
Imperial Secretary Zhou Ke defended Xingyang.
cells.idiomatic: Imperial Secretary Zhou Ke defended Xingyang.

cells.content: 春，定塞、翟、魏、河南、韓、殷國。夏，伐項籍，至彭城。立太子。還據滎陽。
cells.literal: Spring, pacified Sai, Di, Wei, Henan, Han, Yin states. Summer, attacked Xiang Ji, reached Pengcheng. Established crown prince. Returned occupied Xingyang.
cells.idiomatic: In spring, the states of Sai, Di, Wei, Henan, Han, and Yin were pacified. In summer, Xiang Ji was attacked and Pengcheng was reached. A crown prince was established. He returned and occupied Xingyang.

cells.literal: One. Grand Commandant Chang'an Marquis Lu Wan.
cells.idiomatic: Grand Commandant Chang'an Marquis Lu Wan.

cells.content: 魏豹反。使韓信別定魏，伐趙。楚圍我滎陽。
cells.literal: Wei Bao rebelled. Sent Han Xin separately pacify Wei, attack Zhao. Chu surrounded our Xingyang.
cells.idiomatic: Wei Bao rebelled. Han Xin was sent separately to pacify Wei and attack Zhao. The Chu forces surrounded our position at Xingyang.

cells.content: 使韓信別定齊及燕，太公自楚歸，與楚界洪渠。
cells.literal: Sent Han Xin separately pacify Qi and Yan, Duke of Tai from Chu returned, bordered Chu at Hong Canal.
cells.idiomatic: Han Xin was sent separately to pacify Qi and Yan. The Duke of Tai returned from Chu, and the border with Chu was established at the Hong Canal.

cells.literal: Three. Zhou Ke defended Xingyang, died.
cells.idiomatic: Zhou Ke defended Xingyang and died.

cells.literal: Imperial Secretary Fenyin Marquis Zhou Chang.
cells.idiomatic: Imperial Secretary Fenyin Marquis Zhou Chang.

cells.content: 冬，破楚垓下，殺項籍。春，王踐皇帝位定陶。。入都關中。
cells.literal: Winter, defeated Chu at Gaixia, killed Xiang Ji. Spring, king ascended emperor position at Dingtao. Entered capital Guanzhong.
cells.idiomatic: In winter, the Chu forces were defeated at Gaixia and Xiang Ji was killed. In spring, the king ascended the imperial throne at Dingtao and entered the capital at Guanzhong.
The office of Grand Commandant was abolished.

cells.literal: Four. After nine months, Wan became Yan King.
cells.idiomatic: After nine months, Wan became the King of Yan.

cells.content: 尊太公為太上皇。劉仲為代王。立大市。更命咸陽曰長安。
cells.literal: Honored Duke of Tai as Supreme Emperor. Liu Zhong as Dai King. Established grand market. Renamed Xianyang Chang'an.
cells.idiomatic: The Duke of Tai was honored as Supreme Emperor. Liu Zhong was appointed King of Dai. A grand market was established. Xianyang was renamed Chang'an.

cells.content: 六。封為酇侯。。張蒼為計相。
cells.literal: Six. Enfeoffed as Marquis of Tan. Zhang Cang as Finance Chancellor.
cells.idiomatic: He was enfeoffed as the Marquis of Tan. Zhang Cang was appointed Finance Chancellor.

cells.content: 長樂宮成，自櫟陽徙長安。伐匈奴，匈奴圍我平城。
cells.literal: Changle Palace completed, moved from Yueyang to Chang'an. Attacked Xiongnu, Xiongnu surrounded our Pingcheng.
cells.idiomatic: Changle Palace was completed and the court moved from Yueyang to Chang'an. The Xiongnu were attacked, but they surrounded our position at Pingcheng.

cells.content: 擊韓信反虜於趙城。貫高作亂，明年覺，誅之。匈奴攻代王，代王棄國亡，廢為郃陽侯。
cells.literal: Attacked Han Xin rebellion captives at Zhao city. Guan Gao created disturbance, next year discovered, executed him. Xiongnu attacked Dai King, Dai King abandoned country fled, deposed as Marquis of Heyang.
cells.idiomatic: The captives from Han Xin's rebellion were attacked at Zhao city. Guan Gao created a disturbance, was discovered the next year, and executed. The Xiongnu attacked the King of Dai, who abandoned his kingdom and fled. He was deposed and made Marquis of Heyang.

cells.content: 未央宮成，置酒前殿，太上皇輦上坐，帝奉玉卮上壽，曰：「始常以臣不如仲力，今臣功孰與仲多？」太上皇笑，殿上稱萬歲。徙齊田，楚昭、屈、景于關中。
cells.literal: Weiyang Palace completed, set up banquet front hall, Supreme Emperor carried up sat, Emperor offered jade cup wished long life, said: "Previously often thought minister not equal Zhong strength, now minister achievements who with Zhong many?" Supreme Emperor laughed, hall above called ten thousand years. Moved Qi Tian, Chu Zhao, Qu, Jing to Guanzhong.
cells.idiomatic: Weiyang Palace was completed, and a banquet was set up in the front hall. The Supreme Emperor was carried up and seated. The Emperor offered a jade cup and wished him long life, saying: 'Previously I often thought that as a minister I was not equal to Zhong in strength, but now whose achievements are greater, mine or Zhong's?' The Supreme Emperor laughed, and in the hall they called out 'Ten thousand years.' Qi Tian, Chu Zhao, Qu, and Jing were moved to Guanzhong.

cells.literal: Imperial Secretary Chang as Zhao Chancellor.
cells.idiomatic: Imperial Secretary Chang was appointed Chancellor of Zhao.

cells.literal: Supreme Emperor passed away. Chen Xi rebelled Dai territory.
cells.idiomatic: The Supreme Emperor passed away. Chen Xi rebelled in Dai territory.

cells.literal: Imperial Secretary Jiangyi Marquis Zhao Yao.
cells.idiomatic: Imperial Secretary Jiangyi Marquis Zhao Yao.

cells.literal: Executed Huaiyin, Peng Yue. Qing Bu rebelled.
cells.idiomatic: Huaiyin and Peng Yue were executed. Qing Bu rebelled.

cells.content: 周勃為太尉。攻代。後官省。
cells.literal: Zhou Bo as Grand Commandant. Attacked Dai. Rear palaces reduced.
cells.idiomatic: Zhou Bo was appointed Grand Commandant. He attacked Dai. The rear palaces were reduced.

cells.content: 冬，擊布。還過沛。夏，上崩，葬長陵。
cells.literal: Winter, attacked Bu. Returned passed Pei. Summer, Emperor passed away, buried Changling.
cells.idiomatic: In winter, Bu was attacked. On the return journey, they passed through Pei. In summer, the Emperor passed away and was buried at Changling.
This is the first year of Emperor Hui's reign.

cells.content: 趙隱王如意死。始作長安城西北方。除諸侯丞相為相。
cells.literal: Zhao Hidden King Ruyi died. Began building Chang'an city northwestern corner. Removed feudal lords' chancellors to chancellors.
cells.idiomatic: Zhao Hidden King Ruyi died. Construction began on the northwestern corner of Chang'an city. The chancellors of the feudal lords were changed to chancellors.

cells.content: 楚元王、齊悼惠王來朝。七月辛未，何薨。
cells.literal: Chu Yuan King, Qi Dao Hui King came court. Seventh month xinwei, He passed away.
cells.idiomatic: The Chu Yuan King and Qi Dao Hui King came to court. On the xinwei day of the seventh month, Chancellor He passed away.

cells.content: 十四。七月癸巳，齊相平陽侯曹參為相國。
cells.literal: Fourteen. Seventh month gui si, Qi chancellor Pingyang Marquis Cao Shen as Chancellor.
cells.idiomatic: On the gui si day of the seventh month, Qi Chancellor Pingyang Marquis Cao Shen was appointed Chancellor.

cells.content: 初作長安城。蜀湔氐反。擊之。
cells.literal: First built Chang'an city. Shu Jian Di rebelled. Attacked them.
cells.idiomatic: Construction of Chang'an city began. The Shu Jian Di rebelled. They were attacked.

cells.literal: Third month jiashu, amnesty, nothing further labor.
cells.idiomatic: On the jiashu day of the third month, there was a general amnesty. No further forced labor was required.

cells.content: 為高祖立廟於沛城成，置歌兒一百二十人。八月乙丑，參卒。
cells.literal: Established temple for Gaozu at Pei city walls, placed one hundred twenty singing boys. Eighth month yi chou, Shen passed away.
cells.idiomatic: A temple for Gaozu was established at the walls of Pei city, and one hundred twenty singing boys were placed there. On the yi chou day of the eighth month, Shen passed away.

cells.content: 七月，齊悼惠王薨。立太倉、西市。
cells.literal: Seventh month, Qi Dao Hui King passed away. Established Grand Granary, Western Market.
cells.idiomatic: In the seventh month, the Qi Dao Hui King passed away. The Grand Granary and Western Market were established.

cells.content: 一。十月己巳，安國侯王陵為右丞相。曲逆侯陳平為左丞相。
cells.literal: One. Tenth month jisi, Anguo Marquis Wang Ling as Right Chancellor. Qu Ni Marquis Chen Ping as Left Chancellor.
cells.idiomatic: On the jisi day of the tenth month, Anguo Marquis Wang Ling was appointed Right Chancellor. Qu Ni Marquis Chen Ping was appointed Left Chancellor.
Yao was convicted of a crime.

cells.content: 廣阿侯任敖為御史大夫。
cells.literal: Guang'e Marquis Ren Ao as Imperial Secretary.
cells.idiomatic: Guang'e Marquis Ren Ao was appointed Imperial Secretary.

cells.content: 上崩。大臣用張辟彊計，呂氏權重，以呂台為呂王。立少帝。九月辛巳，葬安陵。
cells.literal: Emperor passed away. Ministers used Zhang Piqiang plan, Lü clan power heavy, made Lü Tai Lü King. Established Young Emperor. Ninth month xinsi, buried Anling.
cells.idiomatic: The Emperor passed away. The ministers used Zhang Piqiang's plan. The Lü clan grew powerful and made Lü Tai the King of Lü. A Young Emperor was established. On the xinsi day of the ninth month, he was buried at Anling.
This is the first year of Empress Gao's reign.

cells.content: 王孝惠諸子。置孝悌力田。
cells.literal: Enfeoffed Filial Hui various sons. Established filial piety, brotherly respect, agricultural strength.
cells.idiomatic: She enfeoffed the various sons of Emperor Hui. She established the categories of filial piety, brotherly respect, and agricultural strength.

cells.content: 三。十一月甲子，徙平為右丞相。辟陽侯審食其為左丞相。
cells.literal: Three. Eleventh month jiashu, moved Ping to Right Chancellor. Piyang Marquis Shen Shiqi to Left Chancellor.
cells.idiomatic: On the jiashu day of the eleventh month, Ping was moved to Right Chancellor. Piyang Marquis Shen Shiqi was appointed Left Chancellor.

cells.content: 十二月，呂王台薨，子嘉代立為呂王。行八銖錢。
cells.literal: Twelfth month, Lü King Tai passed away, son Jia succeeded established as Lü King. Circulated eight zhu coins.
cells.idiomatic: In the twelfth month, Lü King Tai passed away, and his son Jia succeeded him as Lü King. Eight zhu coins were circulated.

cells.content: 平陽侯曹窋為御史大夫。。
cells.literal: Pingyang Marquis Cao Juan as Imperial Secretary.
cells.idiomatic: Pingyang Marquis Cao Juan was appointed Imperial Secretary.

cells.content: 廢少帝，更立常山王弘為帝。
cells.literal: Deposed Young Emperor, replaced established Changshan King Hong as Emperor.
cells.idiomatic: The Young Emperor was deposed, and Changshan King Hong was established as Emperor in his place.

cells.literal: Six. Four. Established Grand Commandant office.
cells.idiomatic: The office of Grand Commandant was established.

cells.literal: One. Jiang Marquis Zhou Bo as Grand Commandant.
cells.idiomatic: Jiang Marquis Zhou Bo was appointed Grand Commandant.

cells.content: 八月，淮陽王薨，以其弟壺關侯武為淮陽王。令戍卒歲更。
cells.literal: Eighth month, Huaiyang King passed away, with his younger brother Huguan Marquis Wu as Huaiyang King. Ordered garrison troops annual rotation.
cells.idiomatic: In the eighth month, the Huaiyang King passed away, and his younger brother Huguan Marquis Wu was made Huaiyang King. Garrison troops were ordered to rotate annually.

cells.content: 以呂產為呂王。四月丁酉，赦天下。晝昏。
cells.literal: Made Lü Chan Lü King. Fourth month dingyou, amnesty all under Heaven. Daytime darkened.
cells.idiomatic: Lü Chan was made King of Lü. On the dingyou day of the fourth month, there was a general amnesty. Daytime was darkened.

cells.content: 趙王幽死，以呂祿為趙王。梁王徙趙，自殺。
cells.literal: Zhao King You imprisoned died, made Lü Lu Zhao King. Liang King moved to Zhao, committed suicide.
cells.idiomatic: Zhao King You died while imprisoned, and Lü Lu was made King of Zhao. The Liang King was moved to Zhao and committed suicide.

cells.content: 七月，高后崩。九月，誅諸呂。後九月，代王至，踐皇帝位。後九月，食其免相。
cells.literal: Seventh month, Gao Empress passed away. Ninth month, executed various Lü. After nine months, Dai King arrived, ascended emperor position. After nine months, Shiqi dismissed from chancellor.
cells.idiomatic: In the seventh month, Empress Gao passed away. In the ninth month, the various Lü were executed. Nine months later, the King of Dai arrived and ascended the imperial throne. Nine months after that, Shiqi was dismissed from the chancellorship.

cells.content: 十。七月辛巳，為帝太傅。九月壬戌，復為丞相。八
cells.literal: Ten. Seventh month xinsi, became Emperor Grand Tutor. Ninth month renxu, again became Chancellor. Eight.
cells.idiomatic: On the xinsi day of the seventh month, he became the Emperor's Grand Tutor. On the renxu day of the ninth month, he again became Chancellor.

cells.content: 五。隆慮侯灶為將軍，擊南越。
cells.literal: Five. Longlü Marquis Zao as general, attacked Nanyue.
cells.idiomatic: Longlü Marquis Zao was appointed general and attacked Nanyue.
This is the first year of Emperor Wen's reign.

cells.content: 除收孥相坐律。立太子。賜民爵。
cells.literal: Abolished confiscation families mutual guilt law. Established crown prince. Granted people noble ranks.
cells.idiomatic: The law of confiscating families for mutual guilt was abolished. A crown prince was established. Noble ranks were granted to the people.

cells.content: 十一。十一月辛巳，平徙為左丞相。太尉絳侯周勃為右丞相。
cells.literal: Eleven. Eleventh month xinsi, Ping moved to Left Chancellor. Grand Commandant Jiang Marquis Zhou Bo as Right Chancellor.
cells.idiomatic: On the xinsi day of the eleventh month, Ping was moved to Left Chancellor. Grand Commandant Jiang Marquis Zhou Bo was appointed Right Chancellor.

cells.content: 六。勃為相，潁陰侯灌嬰為太尉。
cells.literal: Six. Bo as chancellor, Yingyin Marquis Guan Ying as Grand Commandant.
cells.idiomatic: Bo was appointed Chancellor, and Yingyin Marquis Guan Ying was appointed Grand Commandant.

cells.content: 除誹謗律。皇子武為代王，參為太原王，揖為梁王。十月，丞相平薨。
cells.literal: Abolished slander law. Imperial son Wu as Dai King, Shen as Taiyuan King, Yi as Liang King. Tenth month, Chancellor Ping passed away.
cells.idiomatic: The slander law was abolished. Imperial son Wu was appointed King of Dai, Shen as King of Taiyuan, and Yi as King of Liang. In the tenth month, Chancellor Ping passed away.

cells.content: 一。十一月乙亥，絳侯勃復為丞相。
cells.literal: One. Eleventh month yi hai, Jiang Marquis Bo again as Chancellor.
cells.idiomatic: On the yi hai day of the eleventh month, Jiang Marquis Bo was appointed Chancellor once again.

cells.content: 徙代王武為淮陽王。上幸太原。濟北王反。匈奴大入上郡。以地盡與太原，太原更號代。十一月壬子，勃免相，之國。
cells.literal: Moved Dai King Wu to Huaiyang King. Emperor visited Taiyuan. Jibei King rebelled. Xiongnu greatly entered Shangjun. With territory all given to Taiyuan, Taiyuan changed name to Dai. Eleventh month renzi, Bo dismissed from chancellor, went to his fief.
cells.idiomatic: Dai King Wu was moved and made King of Huaiyang. The Emperor visited Taiyuan. The King of Jibei rebelled. The Xiongnu greatly invaded Shangjun Commandery. All territory was given to Taiyuan, and Taiyuan was renamed Dai. On the renzi day of the eleventh month, Bo was dismissed from the chancellorship and went to his fief.

cells.content: 一。十二月乙亥，太尉潁陰侯灌嬰為丞相。罷太尉官。
cells.literal: One. Twelfth month yi hai, Grand Commandant Yingyin Marquis Guan Ying as Chancellor. Abolished Grand Commandant office.
cells.idiomatic: On the yi hai day of the twelfth month, Grand Commandant Yingyin Marquis Guan Ying was appointed Chancellor. The office of Grand Commandant was abolished.

cells.content: 二。棘蒲侯陳武為大將軍，擊濟北。昌侯盧卿、共侯盧罷師、甯侯鸱、深澤侯將夜皆為將軍，屬武祁侯賀，將兵屯滎陽。
cells.literal: Two. Jipu Marquis Chen Wu as Grand General, attacked Jibei. Chang Marquis Lu Qing, Gong Marquis Lu Bashi, Ning Marquis Chi, Shenze Marquis Jiang Ye all as generals, subordinate to Wuqi Marquis He, led troops stationed at Xingyang.
cells.idiomatic: The Jipu Marquis Chen Wu was appointed Grand General and attacked Jibei. The Chang Marquis Lu Qing, Gong Marquis Lu Bashi, Ning Marquis Chi, and Shenze Marquis Jiang Ye were all appointed generals, subordinate to the Wuqi Marquis He, and led troops stationed at Xingyang.

cells.literal: Twelfth month jisi, Ying passed away.
cells.idiomatic: On the jisi day of the twelfth month, Ying passed away.

cells.content: 一。正月甲午，御史大夫北平侯張蒼為丞相。
cells.literal: One. First month jiawu, Imperial Secretary Beiping Marquis Zhang Cang as Chancellor.
cells.idiomatic: On the jiawu day of the first month, Imperial Secretary Beiping Marquis Zhang Cang was appointed Chancellor.

cells.content: 安丘侯張說為將軍，擊胡，出代。
cells.literal: Anqiu Marquis Zhang Yue as general, attacked Xiongnu, went out to Dai.
cells.idiomatic: Anqiu Marquis Zhang Yue was appointed general, attacked the Xiongnu, and went out to Dai.

cells.content: 關中侯申屠嘉為御史大夫。
cells.literal: Guanzhong Marquis Shentu Jia as Imperial Secretary.
cells.idiomatic: Guanzhong Marquis Shentu Jia was appointed Imperial Secretary.

cells.literal: Abolished coinage law, people permitted to mint coins
cells.idiomatic: The coinage law was abolished, and the people were permitted to mint coins.

cells.content: 廢淮南王，遷嚴道，道死雍。
cells.literal: Deposed Huainan King, exiled Yan Dao, Dao died in Yong.
cells.idiomatic: The Huainan King was deposed. Yan Dao was exiled, and Dao died in Yong.

cells.literal: Fourth month bingzi, first established Nanling.
cells.idiomatic: On the bingzi day of the fourth month, Nanling was first established.

cells.literal: Grand Coachman Ruyin Marquis Teng Gong passed away.
cells.idiomatic: Grand Coachman Ruyin Marquis Teng Gong passed away.

cells.content: 溫室鐘自鳴。以芷陽鄉為霸陵。
cells.literal: Wen Room bell rang by itself. Made Zhi Yang district Ba Mausoleum.
cells.idiomatic: The bell in the Warm Room rang by itself. Zhiyang District was made into the Ba Mausoleum.

cells.literal: Feudal kings all came to Chang'an.
cells.idiomatic: All the feudal kings came to Chang'an.
The Emperor visited Dai. There was an earthquake.

cells.content: 河決東郡金隄。徙淮陽王為梁王。
cells.literal: Yellow River burst Dongjun Jin Dike. Moved Huaiyang King to Liang King.
cells.idiomatic: The Yellow River burst through the Jin Dike in Dongjun Commandery. The Huaiyang King was moved and made King of Liang.

cells.content: 除肉刑及田租稅律、戍卒令。
cells.literal: Abolished mutilating punishments and field rent tax laws, garrison soldiers edict.
cells.idiomatic: The laws regarding mutilating punishments, field rent taxes, and garrison soldier edicts were abolished.

cells.content: 匈奴大入蕭關，發兵擊之，及屯長安旁。
cells.literal: Xiongnu greatly entered Xiao Pass, dispatched troops attacked them, and stationed beside Chang'an.
cells.idiomatic: The Xiongnu greatly invaded through Xiao Pass. Troops were dispatched to attack them, and they were stationed beside Chang'an.

cells.content: 成侯董赤、內史欒布、昌侯盧卿、隆慮侯灶、甯侯鸱皆為將軍，東陽侯張相如為大將軍，皆擊匈奴。中尉周舍、郎中令張武皆為將軍，屯長安旁。
cells.literal: Cheng Marquis Dong Chi, Interior Minister Luan Bu, Chang Marquis Lu Qing, Longlü Marquis Zao, Ning Marquis Chi all became generals, Dongyang Marquis Zhang Xiangru as Grand General, all attacked Xiongnu. Commander of the Guards Zhou She, Palace Gentlemen Commander Zhang Wu all became generals, stationed beside Chang'an.
cells.idiomatic: Cheng Marquis Dong Chi, Interior Minister Luan Bu, Chang Marquis Lu Qing, Longlü Marquis Zao, and Ning Marquis Chi were all appointed generals. Dongyang Marquis Zhang Xiangru was appointed Grand General. All attacked the Xiongnu. Commander of the Guards Zhou She and Palace Gentlemen Commander Zhang Wu were both appointed generals and stationed beside Chang'an.

cells.content: 黃龍見成紀。上始郊見雍五帝。
cells.literal: Yellow dragon appeared in Chengji. Emperor first suburban sacrifice saw Yong Five Emperors.
cells.idiomatic: A yellow dragon appeared in Chengji. The Emperor first performed the suburban sacrifice and beheld the Five Emperors in Yong.

cells.literal: Emperor first suburban sacrifice saw Wei Yang Five Emperors.
cells.idiomatic: The Emperor first performed the suburban sacrifice and beheld the Five Emperors at Weiyang.
First year of the Empress Dowager's reign.

cells.content: 新垣平詐言方士，覺，誅之。
cells.literal: Xinyuan Ping falsely spoke alchemist, discovered, executed him.
cells.idiomatic: Xinyuan Ping falsely spoke about an alchemist. This was discovered, and he was executed.

cells.content: 匈奴和親。地動。八月戊辰，蒼免相。
cells.literal: Xiongnu peaceful marriage alliance. Earth moved. Eighth month wuchen, Cang dismissed from chancellor.
cells.idiomatic: The Xiongnu established a peaceful marriage alliance. There was an earthquake. On the wuchen day of the eighth month, Cang was dismissed from the chancellorship.

cells.content: 十五。八月庚午，御史大夫申屠嘉為丞相，封故安侯。
cells.literal: Fifteen. Eighth month gengwu, Imperial Secretary Shentu Jia as Chancellor, enfeoffed Marquis of Gu'an.
cells.idiomatic: On the gengwu day of the eighth month, Imperial Secretary Shentu Jia was appointed Chancellor and enfeoffed as Marquis of Gu'an.

cells.content: 匈奴三萬人入上郡，二萬人入雲中。
cells.literal: Xiongnu thirty thousand people entered Shangjun, twenty thousand people entered Yunzhong.
cells.idiomatic: Thirty thousand Xiongnu entered the Shangjun Commandery, and twenty thousand entered Yunzhong.

cells.content: 以中大夫令免為車騎將軍，軍飛狐，故楚相蘇意為將軍，軍句注；。將軍張武屯北地；河內守周亞夫為將軍，軍細柳；宗正劉禮軍霸上；祝茲侯徐厲軍棘門：以備胡。數月，胡去，亦罷。
cells.literal: Made Palace Attendant Ling Mian chariot cavalry general, army Feihu, former Chu chancellor Su Yi as general, army Gounote; General Zhang Wu stationed Beidi; Henei governor Zhou Yafu as general, army Xiliu; Chamberlain for the Imperial Clan Liu Li army Bashang; Marquis of Zhuzi Xu Li army Jimen: to prepare against Xiongnu. Several months, Xiongnu left, also disbanded.
cells.idiomatic: Palace Attendant Ling Mian was appointed Chariot Cavalry General and stationed his army at Feihu. Former Chu Chancellor Su Yi was appointed general and stationed his army at Gounote. General Zhang Wu was stationed at Beidi. Henei Governor Zhou Yafu was appointed general and stationed his army at Xiliu. Chamberlain for the Imperial Clan Liu Li stationed his army at Bashang. Marquis of Zhuzi Xu Li stationed his army at Jimen: all to prepare against the Xiongnu. Several months later, the Xiongnu left, and the armies were also disbanded.

cells.content: 六月己亥，孝文皇帝崩。丁未，太子立。民出臨三日，葬霸陵。
cells.literal: Sixth month jihai, Filial Wen Emperor passed away. Dingwei, crown prince established. People came out to mourn three days, buried Ba Mausoleum.
cells.idiomatic: On the jihai day of the sixth month, Emperor Wen passed away. On dingwei, the crown prince was established. The people came out to mourn for three days, and he was buried in the Ba Mausoleum.

cells.content: 中尉亞夫為車騎將軍，郎中令張武為復土將軍，屬國捍為將屯將軍。詹事戎奴為車騎將軍，侍太后。
cells.literal: Commander of the Guards Yafu as chariot cavalry general, Palace Gentlemen Commander Zhang Wu as earth restoration general, Protectorate Han as army stationing general. Superintendent of the Household Rong Nu as chariot cavalry general, served Empress Dowager.
cells.idiomatic: Commander of the Guards Yafu was appointed Chariot Cavalry General. Palace Gentlemen Commander Zhang Wu was appointed Earth Restoration General. Protectorate Han was appointed Army Stationing General. Superintendent of the Household Rong Nu was appointed Chariot Cavalry General and served the Empress Dowager.
This is the first year of Emperor Jing's reign.

cells.content: 立孝文皇帝廟，郡國為太宗廟。
cells.literal: Established Filial Wen Emperor temple, commanderies and states as Supreme Ancestor temples.
cells.idiomatic: A temple was established for Emperor Wen, and commanderies and states established Supreme Ancestor temples.

cells.literal: Seven. Established Minister of Works office.
cells.idiomatic: Seventh month. The office of Minister of Works was established.

cells.content: 立皇子德為河閒王，閼為臨江王，餘為淮陽王，非為汝南王，彭祖為廣川王，發為長沙王。四月中，孝文太后崩。嘉卒。
cells.literal: Established imperial son De as Hejian King, Yan as Linjiang King, Yu as Huaiyang King, Fei as Runan King, Pengzu as Guangchuan King, Fa as Changsha King. Fourth month middle, Filial Wen Empress Dowager passed away. Jia passed away.
cells.idiomatic: Imperial son De was established as King of Hejian, Yan as King of Linjiang, Yu as King of Huaiyang, Fei as King of Runan, Pengzu as King of Guangchuan, and Fa as King of Changsha. In the middle of the fourth month, Empress Dowager Wen passed away. Jia passed away.

cells.literal: Eight. Kaifeng Marquis Tao Qing as Chancellor.
cells.idiomatic: Eighth month. Kaifeng Marquis Tao Qing was appointed Chancellor.

cells.content: 吳楚七國反，發兵擊，皆破之。皇子端為膠西王，勝為中山王。
cells.literal: Wu Chu seven states rebelled, dispatched troops attacked, all defeated them. Imperial son Duan as Jiaoxi King, Sheng as Zhongshan King.
cells.idiomatic: The seven states of Wu and Chu rebelled. Troops were dispatched to attack them, and all were defeated. Imperial son Duan was established as King of Jiaoxi, and Sheng as King of Zhongshan.
Second month. The office of Grand Commandant was established.

cells.content: 中尉條侯周亞夫。為太尉，擊吳楚；曲周侯酈寄為將軍，擊趙；竇嬰為大將軍，屯滎陽，欒布為將軍，擊齊。
cells.literal: Commander of the Guards Marquis of Tiaoxian Zhou Yafu. Became Grand Commandant, attacked Wu Chu; Marquis of Quzhou Li Ji as general, attacked Zhao; Dou Ying as Grand General, stationed Xingyang, Luan Bu as general, attacked Qi.
cells.idiomatic: Commander of the Guards Marquis of Tiaoxian Zhou Yafu became Grand Commandant and attacked Wu and Chu. Marquis of Quzhou Li Ji was appointed general and attacked Zhao. Dou Ying was appointed Grand General and stationed at Xingyang. Luan Bu was appointed general and attacked Qi.

cells.content: 置陽陵邑。丞相北平侯張蒼卒。
cells.literal: Established Yangling town. Chancellor Beiping Marquis Zhang Cang passed away.
cells.idiomatic: Yangling town was established. Chancellor Beiping Marquis Zhang Cang passed away.

cells.literal: Moved Guangchuan King Pengzu to Zhao King.
cells.idiomatic: Guangchuan King Pengzu was moved and made King of Zhao.

cells.literal: Imperial Secretary Yangling Marquis Cen Mai.
cells.idiomatic: Imperial Secretary Yangling Marquis Cen Mai.

cells.content: 廢太子榮為臨江王。四月丁巳，膠東王立為太子。青罷相。
cells.literal: Deposed crown prince Rong as Linjiang King. Fourth month dingsi, Jiaodong King established as crown prince. Qing dismissed from chancellor.
cells.idiomatic: Crown prince Rong was deposed and made King of Linjiang. On the dingsi day of the fourth month, the Jiaodong King was established as crown prince. Qing was dismissed from the chancellorship.

cells.content: 六月乙巳，太尉條侯亞夫為丞相。罷太尉官。
cells.literal: Sixth month yisi, Grand Commandant Tiaoxian Marquis Yafu as Chancellor. Abolished Grand Commandant office.
cells.idiomatic: On the yisi day of the sixth month, Grand Commandant Tiaoxian Marquis Yafu was appointed Chancellor. The office of Grand Commandant was abolished.
First year of Empress Dowager Wang's reign.

cells.content: 皇子越為廣川王，寄為膠東王。
cells.literal: Imperial son Yue as Guangchuan King, Ji as Jiaodong King.
cells.idiomatic: Imperial son Yue was established as King of Guangchuan, and Ji as King of Jiaodong.

cells.content: 皇子乘為清河王。亞夫免相。
cells.literal: Imperial son Cheng as Qinghe King. Yafu dismissed from chancellor.
cells.idiomatic: Imperial son Cheng was established as King of Qinghe. Yafu was dismissed from the chancellorship.

cells.content: 四。御史大夫桃侯劉舍為丞相。
cells.literal: Four. Imperial Secretary Tao Marquis Liu She as Chancellor.
cells.idiomatic: Fourth month. Imperial Secretary Tao Marquis Liu She was appointed Chancellor.

cells.content: 臨江王徵，自殺，葬藍田，燕數萬為銜士置冢上。
cells.literal: Linjiang King Zheng, committed suicide, buried Lantian, Yan several ten thousand as carrying earth placed on tomb top.
cells.idiomatic: Linjiang King Zheng committed suicide. He was buried in Lantian, and tens of thousands of people from the Yan carried earth to place on top of his tomb.

cells.literal: Imperial son Shun as Changshan King.
cells.idiomatic: Imperial son Shun was established as King of Changshan.

cells.content: 梁孝王武薨。分梁為五國，王諸子：子買為梁王，明為濟川王，彭離為濟東王，定為山陽王，不識為濟陰王。
cells.literal: Liang Xiao King Wu passed away. Divided Liang into five states, enfeoffed various sons: son Mai as Liang King, Ming as Jichuan King, Pengli as Jidong King, Ding as Shanyang King, Bushi as Jiyin King.
cells.idiomatic: The Liang Xiao King Wu passed away. Liang was divided into five states, and his sons were enfeoffed: the son Mai as King of Liang, Ming as King of Jichuan, Pengli as King of Jidong, Ding as King of Shanyang, and Bushi as King of Jiyin.
First year of Empress Dowager Wang's reign.

cells.content: 五月，地動。七月乙巳，日蝕。舍免相。
cells.literal: Fifth month, earth moved. Seventh month yisi, solar eclipse. She dismissed from chancellor.
cells.idiomatic: In the fifth month, there was an earthquake. On the yisi day of the seventh month, there was a solar eclipse. She was dismissed from the chancellorship.

cells.content: 五。八月壬辰，御史大夫建陵侯衛綰為丞相。
cells.literal: Five. Eighth month renchen, Imperial Secretary Jianling Marquis Wei Wan as Chancellor.
cells.idiomatic: Fifth month. On the renchen day of the eighth month, Imperial Secretary Jianling Marquis Wei Wan was appointed Chancellor.

cells.content: 六月丁丑，御史大夫岑邁卒。
cells.literal: Sixth month dingchou, Imperial Secretary Cen Mai passed away.
cells.idiomatic: On the dingchou day of the sixth month, Imperial Secretary Cen Mai passed away.

cells.content: 正月甲子，孝景皇帝崩。二月丙子，太子立。
cells.literal: First month jiashu, Filial Jing Emperor passed away. Second month bingzi, crown prince established.
cells.idiomatic: On the jiashu day of the first month, Emperor Jing passed away. On the bingzi day of the second month, the crown prince was established.

cells.literal: Filial Wu Jian Yuan first year
cells.idiomatic: This is the first year of Emperor Wu's reign.
Wan was dismissed from the chancellorship.

cells.content: 四。魏其侯竇嬰為丞相。置太尉。
cells.literal: Four. Weiqi Marquis Dou Ying as Chancellor. Established Grand Commandant.
cells.idiomatic: Fourth month. Weiqi Marquis Dou Ying was appointed Chancellor. The office of Grand Commandant was established.

cells.literal: Wuan Marquis Tian Fen as Grand Commandant.
cells.idiomatic: Wuan Marquis Tian Fen was appointed Grand Commandant.

cells.literal: Established Maoling. Ying dismissed from chancellor.
cells.idiomatic: Maoling was established. Ying was dismissed from the chancellorship.

cells.content: 二月乙未，太常柏至侯許昌為丞相。蚡免太尉。罷太尉官。
cells.literal: Second month yiwei, Grand Minister of Ceremonies Bozhi Marquis Xu Chang as Chancellor. Fen dismissed from Grand Commandant. Abolished Grand Commandant office.
cells.idiomatic: On the yiwei day of the second month, Grand Minister of Ceremonies Bozhi Marquis Xu Chang was appointed Chancellor. Fen was dismissed from the Grand Commandant position. The office of Grand Commandant was abolished.

cells.content: 東甌王廣武侯望率其眾四萬餘人來降，處廬江郡。
cells.literal: Dong'ou King Guangwu Marquis Wang led his multitude forty thousand plus people came surrender, placed in Lujiang commandery.
cells.idiomatic: King Guangwu Marquis Wang of Dong'ou led more than forty thousand of his followers in surrender. The followers were settled in Lujiang Commandery.
Three-fen coins were put into circulation.

cells.content: 正月，閩越王反。孝景太后崩。。昌免相。
cells.literal: First month, Minyue King rebelled. Filial Jing Empress Dowager passed away. Chang dismissed from chancellor.
cells.idiomatic: In the first month, the King of Minyue rebelled. The Empress Dowager Jing passed away. Chang was dismissed from the chancellorship.

cells.content: 五。六月癸巳，武安侯田蚡為丞相。
cells.literal: Five. Sixth month guisi, Wuan Marquis Tian Fen as Chancellor.
cells.idiomatic: Fifth month. On the guisi day of the sixth month, Wuan Marquis Tian Fen was appointed Chancellor.

cells.literal: Qing Di as Crown Prince Grand Tutor.
cells.idiomatic: Qing Di was appointed Crown Prince Grand Tutor.
This is the first year of the Yuanguang era.

cells.literal: Emperor first went to Yong, suburban sacrifice saw Five Altars.
cells.idiomatic: For the first time, the Emperor went to Yong and performed the suburban sacrifice at the Five Altars.

cells.content: 夏，御史大夫韓安國為護軍將軍，衛尉李廣為驍騎將軍，太僕公孫賀為輕車將軍，大行王恢為將屯將軍，太中大夫李息為材官將軍，篡單于馬邑，不合，誅恢。
cells.literal: Summer, Imperial Secretary Han Anguo as Protector General, Guard Commander Li Guang as Brave Cavalry General, Grand Coachman Gongsun He as Light Chariot General, Chief of Protocol Wang Hui as Army Stationing General, Palace Attendant Li Xi as Equipment General, plotted against Chanyu at Mayi, did not succeed, executed Hui.
cells.idiomatic: In summer, Imperial Secretary Han Anguo was appointed Protector General, Guard Commander Li Guang as Brave Cavalry General, Grand Coachman Gongsun He as Light Chariot General, Chief of Protocol Wang Hui as Army Stationing General, and Palace Attendant Li Xi as Equipment General. They plotted against the Chanyu at Mayi, but the plan did not succeed. Hui was executed.

cells.literal: Fifth month bingzi, Yellow River burst at Hulu.
cells.idiomatic: On the bingzi day of the fifth month, the Yellow River burst its banks at Hulu.

cells.literal: Twelfth month dinghai, earth moved. Fen passed away.
cells.idiomatic: On the dinghai day of the twelfth month, there was an earthquake. Fen passed away.

cells.literal: Five. Pingji Marquis Xue Ze as Chancellor.
cells.idiomatic: Fifth month. Pingji Marquis Xue Ze was appointed Chancellor.

cells.content: 十月，族灌夫家，棄魏其侯市。
cells.literal: Tenth month, exterminated Guan Fu family, exposed Marquis of Weiqi in marketplace.
cells.idiomatic: In the tenth month, the family of Guan Fu was exterminated, and the Marquis of Weiqi was exposed in the marketplace.

cells.literal: Southern Yi first established postal stations.
cells.idiomatic: For the first time, postal stations were established among the Southern Yi.

cells.content: 太中大夫衛青為車騎將軍，出上谷；衛尉李廣為驍騎將軍，出鴈門；大中大夫公孫敖為騎將軍，出代；太僕公孫賀為輕車將軍，出雲中：皆擊匈奴。
cells.literal: Palace Attendant Wei Qing as chariot cavalry general, went out Shanggu; Guard Commander Li Guang as brave cavalry general, went out Yanmen; Palace Attendant Gongsun Ao as cavalry general, went out Dai; Grand Coachman Gongsun He as light chariot general, went out Yunzhong: all attacked Xiongnu.
cells.idiomatic: Palace Attendant Wei Qing was appointed Chariot Cavalry General and went out through Shanggu; Guard Commander Li Guang was appointed Brave Cavalry General and went out through Yanmen; Palace Attendant Gongsun Ao was appointed Cavalry General and went out through Dai; Grand Coachman Gongsun He was appointed Light Chariot General and went out through Yunzhong: all attacked the Xiongnu.
This is the first year of the Yuanshuo era.
Consort Wei was established as Empress.

cells.content: 車騎將軍青出雁門，擊匈奴。衛尉韓安國為將屯將軍，軍代，明年，屯漁陽卒。
cells.literal: Chariot cavalry general Qing went out Yanmen, attacked Xiongnu. Guard commander Han Anguo as army stationing general, army Dai, next year, stationed Yuyang passed away.
cells.idiomatic: Chariot Cavalry General Qing went out through Yanmen and attacked the Xiongnu. Guard Commander Han Anguo was appointed Army Stationing General and stationed his army in Dai. The next year, he was stationed at Yuyang and passed away.

cells.content: 春，車騎將軍衛青出雲中，至高闕，取河南地。
cells.literal: Spring, chariot cavalry general Wei Qing went out Yunzhong, reached Gaoque, took Henan territory.
cells.idiomatic: In spring, Chariot Cavalry General Wei Qing went out through Yunzhong, reached Gaoque, and took the territory of Henan.
The Xiongnu killed Dai Governor You.
The Xiongnu entered Dingxiang, Dai, and Shangjun.

cells.content: 匈奴殺代都尉朱英。澤免相。
cells.literal: Xiongnu killed Dai commandery lieutenant Zhu Ying. Ze dismissed from chancellor.
cells.idiomatic: The Xiongnu killed Dai Commandery Lieutenant Zhu Ying. Ze was dismissed from the chancellorship.

cells.content: 八。十一月乙丑，御史大夫公孫弘為丞相，封平津侯。
cells.literal: Eight. Eleventh month yi chou, Imperial Secretary Gongsun Hong as Chancellor, enfeoffed Marquis of Pingjin.
cells.idiomatic: Eighth month. On the yi chou day of the eleventh month, Imperial Secretary Gongsun Hong was appointed Chancellor and enfeoffed as Marquis of Pingjin.

cells.content: 春，長平侯衛青為大將軍，擊右賢。衛尉蘇建為游擊將軍，屬青。左內史李沮為強弩將軍，太僕賀為車騎將軍，代相李蔡為輕車將軍，岸頭侯張次公為將軍，大行息為將軍：皆屬大將軍，擊匈奴。
cells.literal: Spring, Changping Marquis Wei Qing as Grand General, attacked Youxian. Guard commander Su Jian as roaming strike general, subordinate to Qing. Left interior minister Li Ju as strong crossbow general, grand coachman He as chariot cavalry general, Dai chancellor Li Cai as light chariot general, Antou Marquis Zhang Cihou as general, chief of protocol Xi as general: all subordinate to grand general, attacked Xiongnu.
cells.idiomatic: In spring, Changping Marquis Wei Qing was appointed Grand General and attacked Youxian. Guard Commander Su Jian was appointed Roaming Strike General, subordinate to Qing. Left Interior Minister Li Ju was appointed Strong Crossbow General, Grand Coachman He as Chariot Cavalry General, Dai Chancellor Li Cai as Light Chariot General, Antou Marquis Zhang Cihou as general, and Chief of Protocol Xi as general: all subordinate to the grand general, attacked the Xiongnu.

cells.content: 大將軍青再出定襄擊胡。合騎侯公孫敖為中將軍，太僕賀為左將軍，郎中令李廣為後將軍。翕侯趙信為前將軍，敗降匈奴。衛尉蘇建為右將軍，敗，身脫。左內史沮為彊弩將軍。皆屬青。
cells.literal: Grand general Qing again went out Dingxiang attacked Xiongnu. Heqi Marquis Gongsun Ao as middle general, grand coachman He as left general, palace gentlemen commander Li Guang as rear general. Xi Marquis Zhao Xin as front general, defeated surrendered to Xiongnu. Guard commander Su Jian as right general, defeated, body escaped. Left interior minister Ju as strong crossbow general. All subordinate to Qing.
cells.idiomatic: Grand General Qing again went out through Dingxiang to attack the Xiongnu. Heqi Marquis Gongsun Ao was appointed Middle General, Grand Coachman He as Left General, Palace Gentlemen Commander Li Guang as Rear General. Xi Marquis Zhao Xin was appointed Front General, but was defeated and surrendered to the Xiongnu. Guard Commander Su Jian was appointed Right General, but was defeated and barely escaped with his life. Left Interior Minister Ju was appointed Strong Crossbow General. All were subordinate to Qing.
This is the first year of the Yuanshou era.

cells.content: 十��中，淮南王安、衡山王賜謀反，皆自殺，國除。
cells.literal: Tenth month middle, Huainan King An, Hengshan King Ci plotted rebellion, all committed suicide, states abolished.
cells.idiomatic: In the middle of the tenth month, King An of Huainan and King Ci of Hengshan plotted rebellion. They all committed suicide, and their states were abolished.

cells.content: 匈奴入鴈門、代郡。江都王建反。膠東王子慶立為六安王。弘卒。
cells.literal: Xiongnu entered Yanmen, Dai commandery. Jiangdu King Jian rebelled. Jiaodong King's son Qing established as Liu'an King. Hong passed away.
cells.idiomatic: The Xiongnu entered Yanmen and Dai Commandery. King Jian of Jiangdu rebelled. The son of the King of Jiaodong, Qing, was established as King of Liu'an. Hong passed away.

cells.content: 四。御史大夫樂安侯李蔡為丞相。
cells.literal: Four. Imperial Secretary Le'an Marquis Li Cai as Chancellor.
cells.idiomatic: Fourth month. Imperial Secretary Le'an Marquis Li Cai was appointed Chancellor.

cells.content: 冠軍侯霍去病為驃騎將軍，擊胡，至祁連；合騎侯敖為將軍。出北地；博望侯張騫、郎中令李廣為將軍，出右北平。
cells.literal: Champion Marquis Huo Qubing as super cavalry general, attacked Xiongnu, reached Qilian; Heqi Marquis Ao as general. Went out Beidi; Bowang Marquis Zhang Qian, palace gentlemen commander Li Guang as generals, went out Youbeiping.
cells.idiomatic: Champion Marquis Huo Qubing was appointed Super Cavalry General and attacked the Xiongnu, reaching Qilian; Heqi Marquis Ao was appointed general. They went out through Beidi; Bowang Marquis Zhang Qian and Palace Gentlemen Commander Li Guang were appointed generals and went out through Youbeiping.
The Xiongnu entered Youbeiping and Dingxiang.

cells.content: 大將軍青出定襄，郎中令李廣為前將軍，太僕公孫賀為左將軍，主爵趙食其為右將軍，平陽侯曹襄為後將軍：擊單于。
cells.literal: Grand general Qing went out Dingxiang, palace gentlemen commander Li Guang as front general, grand coachman Gongsun He as left general, director of marquises Zhao Yiqi as right general, Pingyang Marquis Cao Xiang as rear general: attacked Chanyu.
cells.idiomatic: Grand General Qing went out through Dingxiang with Palace Gentlemen Commander Li Guang as Front General, Grand Coachman Gongsun He as Left General, Director of Marquises Zhao Yiqi as Right General, and Pingyang Marquis Cao Xiang as Rear General: they attacked the Chanyu.

cells.literal: Cai sat convicted of invading garden wall, committed suicide.
cells.idiomatic: Cai was convicted of invading a garden wall and committed suicide.

cells.content: 四。太子少傅武彊侯莊青翟為丞相。
cells.literal: Four. Crown prince junior tutor Wuqiang Marquis Zhuang Qing Di as Chancellor.
cells.idiomatic: Fourth month. The Crown Prince Junior Tutor Wuqiang Marquis Zhuang Qing Di was appointed Chancellor.

cells.content: 四月乙巳，皇子閎為齊王，旦為燕王，胥為廣陵王。
cells.literal: Fourth month yisi, imperial son Hong as Qi King, Dan as Yan King, Xu as Guangling King.
cells.idiomatic: On the yisi day of the fourth month, imperial son Hong was established as King of Qi, Dan as King of Yan, and Xu as King of Guangling.
This is the first year of the Yuanding era.

cells.literal: Qing Di had crime, committed suicide.
cells.idiomatic: Qing Di was guilty of a crime and committed suicide.

cells.content: 四。太子太傅高陵侯趙周為丞相。
cells.literal: Four. Crown prince grand tutor Gaoling Marquis Zhao Zhou as Chancellor.
cells.idiomatic: Fourth month. Crown Prince Grand Tutor Gaoling Marquis Zhao Zhou was appointed Chancellor.
Tang was guilty of a crime and committed suicide.

cells.content: 立常山憲王子平為真定王，商為泗水王。六月中，河東汾陰得寶鼎。
cells.literal: Established Changshan Xian King's son Ping as Zhending King, Shang as Sishui King. Sixth month middle, Hedong Fenying obtained precious tripod.
cells.idiomatic: The son of Changshan King Xian, Ping, was established as King of Zhending, and Shang as King of Sishui. In the middle of the sixth month, a precious tripod was obtained at Hedong Fenying.

cells.content: 三月中，南越相嘉反，殺其王及漢使者。八月，周坐酎金，自殺。
cells.literal: Third month middle, Nanyue chancellor Jia rebelled, killed their king and Han envoy. Eighth month, Zhou sat convicted of tribute gold, committed suicide.
cells.idiomatic: In the middle of the third month, Nanyue Chancellor Jia rebelled and killed their king as well as the Han envoy. In the eighth month, Zhou was convicted of tribute gold irregularities and committed suicide.

cells.content: 四。九月辛巳，御史大夫石慶為丞相，封牧丘侯。
cells.literal: Four. Ninth month xinsi, Imperial Secretary Shi Qing as Chancellor, enfeoffed Marquis of Muqiu.
cells.idiomatic: Fourth month. On the xinsi day of the ninth month, Imperial Secretary Shi Qing was appointed Chancellor and enfeoffed as Marquis of Muqiu.

cells.content: 衛尉路博德為伏波將軍，出桂陽；主爵楊僕為樓船將軍，出豫章：皆破南越。
cells.literal: Guard commander Lu Bode as Subduing Waves general, went out Guiyang; director of marquises Yang Pu as Tower Ship general, went out Yuzhang: all defeated Nanyue.
cells.idiomatic: Guard Commander Lu Bode was appointed Subduing Waves General and went out through Guiyang; the Director of Marquises Yang Pu was appointed Tower Ship General and went out through Yuzhang: both defeated Nanyue.
In the twelfth month, Dongyue rebelled.

cells.content: 故龍镪侯韓說為橫海將軍，出會稽；樓船將軍楊僕出豫章；中尉王溫舒出會稽：皆破東越。
cells.literal: Former Longqiang Marquis Han Yue as Transverse Sea general, went out Kuaiji; tower ship general Yang Pu went out Yuzhang; commander Wang Wenshu went out Kuaiji: all defeated Dongyue.
cells.idiomatic: The former Longqiang Marquis Han Yue was appointed Transverse Sea General and went out through Kuaiji; the Tower Ship General Yang Pu went out through Yuzhang; Commander Wang Wenshu went out through Kuaiji: all defeated Dongyue.
This is the first year of the Yuanfeng era.

cells.content: 秋，樓船將軍楊僕、左將軍荀彘出遼東，擊朝鮮。
cells.literal: Autumn, tower ship general Yang Pu, left general Xun Zhi went out Liaodong, attacked Korea.
cells.idiomatic: In autumn, the Tower Ship General Yang Pu and Left General Xun Zhi went out through Liaodong and attacked Korea.
This is the first year of the Taichu era.

cells.literal: Reformed calendar, made first month the year beginning.
cells.idiomatic: The calendar was reformed, and the first month was made the beginning of the year.

cells.literal: First month wuyin, Qing passed away.
cells.idiomatic: On the wuyin day of the first month, Qing passed away.

cells.content: 十。三月丁卯，太僕公孫賀為丞相，封葛繹侯。
cells.literal: Ten. Third month dingmao, grand coachman Gongsun He as Chancellor, enfeoffed Marquis of Geyan.
cells.idiomatic: Tenth month. On the dingmao day of the third month, Grand Coachman Gongsun He was appointed Chancellor and enfeoffed as Marquis of Geyan.
This is the first year of the Tianhan era.

cells.content: 春，貳師將軍李廣利出朔方，至余吾水上；游擊將軍韓說出五原；因杅將軍公孫敖：皆擊匈奴。
cells.literal: Spring, Ershi general Li Guangli went out Shuofang, reached Yuwu water above; roaming strike general Han Yue went out Wuyuan; Yinmi general Gongsun Ao: all attacked Xiongnu.
cells.idiomatic: In spring, the Ershi General Li Guangli went out through Shuofang and reached the banks of the Yuwu River; the Roaming Strike General Han Yue went out through Wuyuan; the Yinmi General Gongsun Ao: all attacked the Xiongnu.
This is the first year of the Taishi era.
This is the first year of the Zhenghe era.

cells.literal: Winter, He sat convicted of witchcraft died.
cells.idiomatic: In winter, He was convicted of witchcraft and died.

cells.content: 七月壬午，太子發兵，殺游擊將軍說、使者江充。
cells.literal: Seventh month renwu, crown prince raised troops, killed roaming strike general Yue, envoy Jiang Chong.
cells.idiomatic: On the renwu day of the seventh month, the crown prince raised troops and killed the Roaming Strike General Yue and the envoy Jiang Chong.

cells.content: 三月丁巳，涿郡太守劉屈氂為丞相，封彭城侯。
cells.literal: Third month dingsi, Zhuojun governor Liu Quji as Chancellor, enfeoffed Pengcheng Marquis.
cells.idiomatic: On the dingsi day of the third month, Zhuojun Governor Liu Quji was appointed Chancellor and enfeoffed as Pengcheng Marquis.

cells.literal: Sixth month, Liu Quji because of witchcraft beheaded.
cells.idiomatic: In the sixth month, Liu Quji was beheaded because of witchcraft.

cells.content: 春，貳師將軍李廣利出朔方，以兵降胡。重合侯莽通出酒泉，御史大夫商丘成出河西，擊匈奴。
cells.literal: Spring, Ershi general Li Guangli went out Shuofang, with troops surrendered to Xiongnu. Chonghe Marquis Mang Tong went out Jiuquan, Imperial Secretary Shangqiu Cheng went out Hexi, attacked Xiongnu.
cells.idiomatic: In spring, the Ershi General Li Guangli went out through Shuofang and surrendered his troops to the Xiongnu. The Chonghe Marquis Mang Tong went out through Jiuquan, and the Imperial Secretary Shangqiu Cheng went out through Hexi to attack the Xiongnu.

cells.content: 六月丁巳，大鴻臚田千秋為丞相，封富民侯。
cells.literal: Sixth month dingsi, Grand Herald Tian Qianqiu as Chancellor, enfeoffed Fumin Marquis.
cells.idiomatic: On the dingsi day of the sixth month, Grand Herald Tian Qianqiu was appointed Chancellor and enfeoffed as Fumin Marquis.
This is the first year of the Houyuan era.

cells.content: 二月己巳，光祿大夫霍光為大將軍，博陸侯；都尉金日磾為車騎將軍，秺侯；太僕安陽侯上官舛為大將軍。
cells.literal: Second month jisi, Palace Steward Huo Guang as Grand General, Bolu Marquis; Commandant Jin Midi as Chariot Cavalry General, Duo Marquis; Grand Coachman Anyang Marquis Shangguan Jie as Grand General.
cells.idiomatic: On the jisi day of the second month, the Palace Steward Huo Guang was appointed Grand General and Bolu Marquis; the Commandant Jin Midi was appointed Chariot Cavalry General and Duo Marquis; the Grand Coachman Anyang Marquis Shangguan Jie was appointed Grand General.

cells.literal: Filial Zhao Shi Yuan first year
cells.idiomatic: This is the first year of the Shiyuan era under Emperor Zhao.

cells.literal: Four. Ninth month, Midi passed away.
cells.idiomatic: Fourth month. In the ninth month, Midi passed away.

cells.content: 三月癸酉，衛尉王莽為左將軍，騎都尉上官安為車騎將軍。
cells.literal: Third month guiyou, Guard Commander Wang Mang as Left General, Cavalry Commandant Shangguan An as Chariot Cavalry General.
cells.idiomatic: On the guiyou day of the third month, Guard Commander Wang Mang was appointed Left General, and Cavalry Commandant Shangguan An was appointed Chariot Cavalry General.
This is the first year of the Yuanfeng era.

cells.content: 九月庚午，光祿勳張安世為右將軍。
cells.literal: Ninth month gengwu, Palace Steward Excellency Zhang Anshi as Right General.
cells.idiomatic: On the gengwu day of the ninth month, Palace Steward Excellency Zhang Anshi was appointed Right General.

cells.content: 十二月庚寅，中郎將范明友為度遼將軍，擊烏丸。
cells.literal: Twelfth month gengyin, Attendant-in-ordinary Fan Mingyou as Cross-Liao General, attacked Wuwan.
cells.idiomatic: On the gengyin day of the twelfth month, Attendant-in-ordinary Fan Mingyou was appointed Cross-Liao General and attacked the Wuwan.

cells.literal: Third month jiaxu, Qianqiu passed away.
cells.idiomatic: On the jiaxu day of the third month, Qianqiu passed away.

cells.content: 三月乙丑，御史大夫王訢為丞相，封富春侯。
cells.literal: Third month yichou, Imperial Secretary Wang Xin as Chancellor, enfeoffed Fuchun Marquis.
cells.idiomatic: On the yichou day of the third month, Imperial Secretary Wang Xin was appointed Chancellor and enfeoffed as Fuchun Marquis.

cells.literal: Twelfth month gengxu, Xin passed away.
cells.idiomatic: On the gengxu day of the twelfth month, Xin passed away.

cells.content: 十一月乙丑，御史大夫楊敞為丞相，封安平侯。
cells.literal: Eleventh month yichou, Imperial Secretary Yang Chang as Chancellor, enfeoffed Anping Marquis.
cells.idiomatic: On the yichou day of the eleventh month, Imperial Secretary Yang Chang was appointed Chancellor and enfeoffed as Anping Marquis.

cells.content: 九月庚寅，衛尉平陵侯范明友為度遼將軍，擊烏丸。
cells.literal: Ninth month gengyin, Guard Commander Pingling Marquis Fan Mingyou as Cross-Liao General, attacked Wuwan.
cells.idiomatic: On the gengyin day of the ninth month, Guard Commander Pingling Marquis Fan Mingyou was appointed Cross-Liao General and attacked the Wuwan.
This is the first year of the Yuanping era.

cells.content: 九月戊戌，御史大夫蔡義為丞相，封陽平侯。
cells.literal: Ninth month wuxu, Imperial Secretary Cai Yi as Chancellor, enfeoffed Yangping Marquis.
cells.idiomatic: On the wuxu day of the ninth month, Imperial Secretary Cai Yi was appointed Chancellor and enfeoffed as Yangping Marquis.

cells.content: 四月甲申，光祿大夫龍镪侯韓曾為前將軍。五月丁酉，水衡都尉趙充國為後將軍，右將軍張安世為車騎將軍。
cells.literal: Fourth month jiashen, Palace Steward Longqiang Marquis Han Zeng as Front General. Fifth month dingyou, Water Works Commandant Zhao Chongguo as Rear General, Right General Zhang Anshi as Chariot Cavalry General.
cells.idiomatic: On the jiashen day of the fourth month, Palace Steward Longqiang Marquis Han Zeng was appointed Front General. On the dingyou day of the fifth month, Water Works Commandant Zhao Chongguo was appointed Rear General, and Right General Zhang Anshi was appointed Chariot Cavalry General.

cells.content: 御史大夫昌水侯田廣明。
cells.literal: Imperial Secretary Changshui Marquis Tian Guangming.
cells.idiomatic: Imperial Secretary Changshui Marquis Tian Guangming.

cells.literal: Filial Xuan Ben Shi first year
cells.idiomatic: This is the first year of the Benshi era under Emperor Xuan.

cells.content: 七月庚寅，御史大夫田廣明為祁連將軍，龍镪侯韓曾為後將軍，營平侯趙充國為蒲類將軍，度遼將軍平陵侯范明友為雲中太守，富民侯田順為虎牙將軍：皆擊匈奴。
cells.literal: Seventh month gengyin, Imperial Secretary Tian Guangming as Qilian General, Longqiang Marquis Han Zeng as Rear General, Yingping Marquis Zhao Chongguo as Pulei General, Cross-Liao General Pingling Marquis Fan Mingyou as Yunzhong Governor, Fumin Marquis Tian Shun as Tiger Fang General: all attacked Xiongnu.
cells.idiomatic: On the gengyin day of the seventh month, Imperial Secretary Tian Guangming was appointed Qilian General, Longqiang Marquis Han Zeng was appointed Rear General, Yingping Marquis Zhao Chongguo was appointed Pulei General, Cross-Liao General Pingling Marquis Fan Mingyou was appointed Yunzhong Governor, and Fumin Marquis Tian Shun was appointed Tiger Fang General: all attacked the Xiongnu.

cells.content: 三月戊子，皇后崩。六月乙丑，義薨。
cells.literal: Third month wuzi, Empress passed away. Sixth month yichou, Yi passed away.
cells.idiomatic: On the wuzi day of the third month, the Empress passed away. On the yichou day of the sixth month, Yi passed away.

cells.content: 六月甲辰，長信少府韋賢為丞相，封扶陽侯。田廣明、田順擊胡還，皆自殺。充國奪將軍印。
cells.literal: Sixth month jiachen, Changxin Superintendent Wei Xian as Chancellor, enfeoffed Fuyang Marquis. Tian Guangming, Tian Shun attacked Xiongnu returned, both committed suicide. Chongguo deprived of general seal.
cells.idiomatic: On the jiachen day of the sixth month, Changxin Superintendent Wei Xian was appointed Chancellor and enfeoffed as Fuyang Marquis. Tian Guangming and Tian Shun returned after attacking the Xiongnu and both committed suicide. Chongguo was deprived of his general's seal.

cells.literal: Tenth month yimao, established Huo Empress.
cells.idiomatic: On the yimao day of the tenth month, Empress Huo was established.
This is the first year of the Dijie era.

cells.literal: Four. Third month gengwu, General Guang passed away.
cells.idiomatic: Fourth month. On the gengwu day of the third month, General Guang passed away.

cells.content: 二月丁卯，侍中、中郎將霍禹為右將軍。
cells.literal: Second month dingmao, Palace Attendant, Attendant-in-ordinary Huo Yu as Right General.
cells.idiomatic: On the dingmao day of the second month, Palace Attendant and Attendant-in-ordinary Huo Yu was appointed Right General.

cells.content: 立太子。五月甲申，賢老，賜金百斤。
cells.literal: Established crown prince. Fifth month jiashen, Xian aged, granted gold one hundred jin.
cells.idiomatic: The crown prince was established. On the jiashen day of the fifth month, Xian, being aged, was granted one hundred jin of gold.

cells.content: 六月壬辰，御史大夫魏相為丞相，封高平侯。
cells.literal: Sixth month renchen, Imperial Secretary Wei Xiang as Chancellor, enfeoffed Gaoping Marquis.
cells.idiomatic: On the renchen day of the sixth month, Imperial Secretary Wei Xiang was appointed Chancellor and enfeoffed as Gaoping Marquis.

cells.content: 七月，安世為大司馬、衛將軍。禹為大司馬。
cells.literal: Seventh month, Anshi as Grand Marshal, Guard General. Yu as Grand Marshal.
cells.idiomatic: In the seventh month, Anshi was appointed Grand Marshal and Guard General. Yu was appointed Grand Marshal.

cells.literal: Two. Seventh month renyin, Yu waist beheaded.
cells.idiomatic: Second month. On the renyin day of the seventh month, Yu was beheaded at the waist.
This is the first year of the Yuankang era.

cells.literal: Six. Eighth month bingyin, Anshi passed away.
cells.idiomatic: Sixth month. On the bingyin day of the eighth month, Anshi passed away.
This is the first year of the Shenjue era.

cells.content: 上郊甘泉太畤、汾陰后土。
cells.literal: Above suburban Ganguan Great Altar, Fenyin Hou Tu.
cells.idiomatic: The Emperor performed the suburban sacrifice at the Ganguan Great Altar and the Fenyin Hou Tu.

cells.content: 四月，樂成侯許延壽為強弩將軍。後將軍充國擊羌。酒泉太守辛武賢為破羌將軍。韓曾為大司馬、車騎將軍。
cells.literal: Fourth month, Yuecheng Marquis Xu Yanshou as Strong Crossbow General. Rear General Chongguo attacked Qiang. Jiuquan Governor Xin Wuxian as Break Qiang General. Han Zeng as Grand Marshal, Chariot Cavalry General.
cells.idiomatic: In the fourth month, Yuecheng Marquis Xu Yanshou was appointed Strong Crossbow General. The Rear General Chongguo attacked the Qiang. Jiuquan Governor Xin Wuxian was appointed Break Qiang General. Han Zeng was appointed Grand Marshal and Chariot Cavalry General.

cells.content: 上郊雍五畤。祋祤出寶璧玉器。
cells.literal: Above suburban Yong Five Altars. Qiwei produced precious jade bi and jade vessels.
cells.idiomatic: The Emperor performed the suburban sacrifice at the Yong Five Altars. Qiwei produced precious jade bi and jade vessels.
In the third month, the Chancellor passed away.

cells.content: 四月戊戌，御史大夫邴吉為丞相，封博陽侯。
cells.literal: Fourth month wuxu, Imperial Secretary Bing Ji as Chancellor, enfeoffed Boyang Marquis.
cells.idiomatic: On the wuxu day of the fourth month, Imperial Secretary Bing Ji was appointed Chancellor and enfeoffed as Boyang Marquis.
This is the first year of the Wufeng era.

cells.literal: Four. Fifth month jichou, Zeng passed away.
cells.idiomatic: Fourth month. On the jichou day of the fifth month, Zeng passed away.

cells.content: 五月，延壽為大司馬、車騎將軍。
cells.literal: Fifth month, Yanshou as Grand Marshal, Chariot Cavalry General.
cells.idiomatic: In the fifth month, Yanshou was appointed Grand Marshal and Chariot Cavalry General.
In the first month, Ji passed away.

cells.content: 三月壬申，御史大夫黃霸為丞相，封建成侯。
cells.literal: Third month renshen, Imperial Secretary Huang Ba as Chancellor, enfeoffed Jiancheng Marquis.
cells.idiomatic: On the renshen day of the third month, Imperial Secretary Huang Ba was appointed Chancellor and enfeoffed as Jiancheng Marquis.
This is the first year of the Ganlu era.

cells.literal: Three. Third month dingwei, Yanshou passed away.
cells.idiomatic: Third month. On the dingwei day of the third month, Yanshou passed away.

cells.content: 赦殊死，賜高年及鰥寡孤獨帛，女子牛酒。
cells.literal: Pardoned capital punishment, granted silk to elderly and widows widowers orphans solitaries, women oxen wine.
cells.idiomatic: Capital punishment was pardoned, and silk was granted to the elderly, widows, widowers, orphans, and the solitary. Women were granted oxen and wine.

cells.literal: Third month jichou, Ba passed away.
cells.idiomatic: On the jichou day of the third month, Ba passed away.

cells.content: 七月丁巳，御史大夫于定國為丞相，封西平侯。
cells.literal: Seventh month dingsi, Imperial Secretary Yu Dingguo as Chancellor, enfeoffed Xiping Marquis.
cells.idiomatic: On the dingsi day of the seventh month, Imperial Secretary Yu Dingguo was appointed Chancellor and enfeoffed as Xiping Marquis.

cells.content: 太僕陳萬年為御史大夫。
cells.literal: Grand Coachman Chen Wannian as Imperial Secretary.
cells.idiomatic: Grand Coachman Chen Wannian was appointed Imperial Secretary.
This is the first year of the Huanglong era.

cells.content: 樂陵侯史子長為大司馬、車騎將軍。太子太傅蕭望之為前將軍。
cells.literal: Leling Marquis Shi Zichang as Grand Marshal, Chariot Cavalry General. Crown Prince Grand Tutor Xiao Wangzhi as Front General.
cells.idiomatic: The Leling Marquis Shi Zichang was appointed Grand Marshal and Chariot Cavalry General. The Crown Prince Grand Tutor Xiao Wangzhi was appointed Front General.

cells.literal: Filial Yuan Chu Yuan first year
cells.idiomatic: This is the first year of the Chuyuan era of Emperor Xiaoyuan.

cells.content: 十二月，執金吾馮奉世為右將軍。
cells.literal: Twelfth month, Imperial Guard Feng Fengshi as Right General.
cells.idiomatic: In the twelfth month, Imperial Guard Feng Fengshi was appointed Right General.

cells.content: 二月丁巳，平恩侯許嘉為左將軍。
cells.literal: Second month dingsi, Ping'en Marquis Xu Jia as Left General.
cells.idiomatic: On the dingsi day of the second month, Ping'en Marquis Xu Jia was appointed Left General.

cells.content: 中少府貢禹為御史大夫。十二月丁未，長信少府薛廣德為御史大夫。
cells.literal: Central Superintendent Gong Yu as Imperial Secretary. Twelfth month dingwei, Changxin Superintendent Xue Guangde as Imperial Secretary.
cells.idiomatic: Central Superintendent Gong Yu was appointed Imperial Secretary. On the dingwei day of the twelfth month, Changxin Superintendent Xue Guangde was appointed Imperial Secretary.
This is the first year of the Yongguang era.
On the wuyin day of the tenth month, Dingguo was dismissed.

cells.literal: Nine. Seventh month, Zichang dismissed, retired to his mansion.
cells.idiomatic: Ninth month. In the seventh month, Zichang was dismissed and retired to his mansion.

cells.content: 九月，衛尉平昌侯王接為大司馬、車騎將軍。二月，廣德免。
cells.literal: Ninth month, Guard Commander Pingchang Marquis Wang Jie as Grand Marshal, Chariot Cavalry General. Second month, Guangde dismissed.
cells.idiomatic: In the ninth month, Guard Commander Pingchang Marquis Wang Jie was appointed Grand Marshal and Chariot Cavalry General. In the second month, Guangde was dismissed.

cells.content: 七月，太子太傅韋玄成為御史大夫。
cells.literal: Seventh month, Crown Prince Grand Tutor Wei Xuancheng as Imperial Secretary.
cells.idiomatic: In the seventh month, Crown Prince Grand Tutor Wei Xuancheng was appointed Imperial Secretary.

cells.literal: Third month renxu new moon, solar eclipse.
cells.idiomatic: On the renxu day, which was the new moon of the third month, there was a solar eclipse.

cells.content: 二月丁酉，御史大夫韋玄成為丞相，封扶陽侯。丞相賢子。
cells.literal: Second month dingyou, Imperial Secretary Wei Xuancheng as Chancellor, enfeoffed Fuyang Marquis. Chancellor Xian son.
cells.idiomatic: On the dingyou day of the second month, Imperial Secretary Wei Xuancheng was appointed Chancellor and enfeoffed as Fuyang Marquis. He was the son of Chancellor Xian.

cells.content: 七月，太常任千秋為奮武將軍，擊西羌；雲中太守韓次君為建威將軍，擊羌。後不行。
cells.literal: Seventh month, Grand Minister of Ceremonies Ren Qianqiu as Fenwu General, attacked Western Qiang; Yunzhong Governor Han Cijun as Jianwei General, attacked Qiang. Later not carried out.
cells.idiomatic: In the seventh month, Grand Minister of Ceremonies Ren Qianqiu was appointed Fenwu General to attack the Western Qiang; Yunzhong Governor Han Cijun was appointed Jianwei General to attack the Qiang. Later this was not carried out.

cells.content: 二月丁酉，右扶風鄭弘為御史大夫。
cells.literal: Second month dingyou, Right Fufeng Zheng Hong as Imperial Secretary.
cells.idiomatic: On the dingyou day of the second month, Right Fufeng Zheng Hong was appointed Imperial Secretary.

cells.content: 右將軍平恩侯許嘉為車騎將軍，侍中、光祿大夫樂昌侯王商為右將軍，右將軍馮奉世為左將軍。
cells.literal: Right General Ping'en Marquis Xu Jia as Chariot Cavalry General, Palace Attendant, Palace Steward Yuechang Marquis Wang Shang as Right General, Right General Feng Fengshi as Left General.

cells.content: 光祿勳匡衡為御史大夫。
cells.literal: Palace Steward Excellency Kuang Heng as Imperial Secretary.
Sixth month jiachen, Xuancheng passed away.

cells.content: 七月癸亥，御史大夫匡衡為丞相，封樂安侯。
cells.literal: Seventh month guihai, Imperial Secretary Kuang Heng as Chancellor, enfeoffed Le'an Marquis.

cells.content: 衛尉繁延壽為御史大夫。
cells.literal: Guard Commander Fan Yanshou as Imperial Secretary.

cells.content: 六月己未，衛尉楊平侯王鳳為大司馬、大將軍。延壽卒。
cells.literal: Sixth month jiwei, Guard Commander Yangping Marquis Wang Feng as Grand Marshal, Grand General. Yanshou passed away.

cells.content: 三月丙寅，太子少傅張譚為御史大夫。
cells.literal: Third month bingyin, Crown Prince Junior Tutor Zhang Tan as Imperial Secretary.
Filial Cheng Jian Shi first year

cells.content: 七。八月癸丑，遣光祿勳詔嘉上印綬免，賜金二百斤。
cells.literal: Seven. Eighth month guiyou, sent Palace Steward Excellency Zhao Jia to return seals dismissed, granted gold two hundred jin.

cells.content: 十月，右將軍樂昌侯王商為光祿大夫、右將軍，執金吾弋陽侯任千秋為右將軍。譚免。
cells.literal: Tenth month, Right General Yuechang Marquis Wang Shang as Palace Steward, Right General, Imperial Guard Yiyang Marquis Ren Qianqiu as Right General. Tan dismissed.
Court Judge Yin Zhong as Imperial Secretary.

cells.content: 三月甲申，右將軍樂昌侯王商為右丞相。
cells.literal: Third month jiashen, Right General Yuechang Marquis Wang Shang as Right Chancellor.

cells.content: 任千秋為左將軍，長樂衛尉史丹為右將軍。十月己亥，尹忠自剌殺。
cells.literal: Ren Qianqiu as Left General, Changle Guard Commander Shi Dan as Right General. Tenth month jihai, Yin Zhong self-stabbed killed.
Superintendent Zhang Zhong as Imperial Secretary.

cells.content: 十月辛卯，史丹為左將軍，太僕平安侯王章為右將軍。
cells.literal: Tenth month xinmao, Shi Dan as Left General, Grand Coachman Ping'an Marquis Wang Zhang as Right General.
Fourth month renyin, Chancellor Shang dismissed.

cells.content: 六月丙午，諸吏散騎光祿大夫張禹為丞相。
cells.literal: Sixth month bingwu, Various officials attendant cavalier Palace Steward Zhang Yu as Chancellor.

cells.content: 六月，太僕王音為御史大夫。
cells.literal: Sixth month, Grand Coachman Wang Yin as Imperial Secretary.

cells.content: 九月甲子，御史大夫王音為車騎將軍。
cells.literal: Ninth month jiashu, Imperial Secretary Wang Yin as Chariot Cavalry General.

cells.content: 十月乙卯，光祿勳于永為御史大夫。
cells.literal: Tenth month yimao, Palace Steward Excellency Yu Yong as Imperial Secretary.

cells.content: 七月乙丑，右將軍光祿勳平安侯王章卒。
cells.literal: Seventh month yichou, Right General Palace Steward Excellency Ping'an Marquis Wang Zhang passed away.
Intercalary month renshu, Yong passed away.
Fourth month gengchen, Xue Xuan as Chancellor.
